blog.name: bnha-stickers
blog.title: BNHA Imagines ;)
blog.description: not-so-lovely writings bc vanilla ain't my thing || shongu • she/her || REQUESTS: CLOSED, CONCEPTS: OPEN || rules: #shongu rules || 18+

body:
Request Prompts

i’m literally bored 24/7 and all i can do is either write songs or fanfics so here’re some prompts! u can only pick two (2) prompts maximum and pls tell me who is saying the prompt and what gender u would like! also remember to consult the rules (#shongu rules) before making a request! tysm!! xo - shongu

FLUFF!

1.) “I love you and all, but can you please let go of my leg?”

2.) “Stop slapping my ass!”

3.) “If you keep eating my leftovers I’m going to dropkick you.”

4.) “You look so cute with your hair like this!”

5.) “You’re so clumsy…”

6.) “If you say one more pun, I swear, you won’t be safe for the next 24 hours.”

7.) “Your fly is down.”

8.) “Are you trying to make a pillow fort? It’s not working, just letting you know.”

9.) “I’m not ticklish!”

10.) “So, whatcha watchin’?”

ANGST!

11.) “I’m sorry, but this is just too much.”

12.) “How long has this been going on?”

13.) “You said you were different from everyone else, but I guess not.”

14.) “I stuck with you through thick and thin, and this is what I’m rewarded with?”

15.) “Please, don’t go…”

16.) “I promise I’ll do better!”

17.) “I’m not the problem, you are.”

18.) “Do you have any idea how hard it is?”

19.) “I hate you!”

20.) “I loved you!”

SMUT!

21.) “I want you. Now. Get on the bed.”

22.) “I couldn’t hear you, I think you need to speak up.”

23.) “Please let me come!”

24.) “Are you sure it’s gonna fit?”

25.) “No more! It’s too sensitive!”

26.) “Don’t worry, I’ll take good care of you.”

27.) “You look so good wearing my clothes.”

28.) “Come for me, again.”

29.) “You’re going to take whatever I give you.”

30.) “You want more?”

OTHER!

31.) “Don’t hurt me!”

32.) “If you wanted me so badly, why didn’t you just say so?”

33.) “Aw, don’t worry baby, Daddy/Mommy’s not gonna hurt you!”

34.) “Why do you look so sad?”

35.) “Put on the collar or I’ll put it on for you.”

36.) “Do you want to be punished? Is that what this is?”

37.) “You’re being such a good, obedient little pet for me, aren’t you?”

38.) “Stop struggling, you’re just making this harder on yourself.”

39.) “Where were you last night?”

40.) “You’re mine.”

summary: When I first saw pictures and fanarts of Kirishima before I even started watching My Hero Academia or reading the manga, I...
body:
First Thoughts on Kirishima

When I first saw pictures and fanarts of Kirishima before I even started watching My Hero Academia or reading the manga, I thought he was this scary dude who craves violence and fighting or something. I also thought he and Bakugo were rivals and the only thing they agree on is their desire to bully Midoriya. Or that he was a villain.

I was so confused when I actually read the manga because Kirishima is literally the sweetest guy and I love him. Now, no matter what he does, I could never see him as anything less than a literal angel. I’m sorry for judging you, Kiri.

Now, please look at this cute picture of him as my way of apologizing.

(｡･ω･｡)ﾉ♡
